data.text: @OliviaAEckart #Israel is a magical place! We hope you are able to visit one day!
@hharteveldt We think so too!
@lbrowdy Please send an email to socialmedia@elalusa.com for an expedited reply!
@yaelmarkovich We hope you have a wonderful trip!
This calls for a #ThrowBackThursday! Do you recognize this #ELAL plane from the 80's? http://t.co/gtCVSpQas2
@OhhMyMolly We wish you a wonderful trip!
@rMorrxo We hope you have a wonderful trip!
@sethacohen33 We hope you have a wonderful trip!
@lbrowdy Good luck!!
@simoneg2000 Can you please email this same message to socialmedia@elalusa.com for an expedited reply?
@Saladin_Salomon We hope you have a wonderful trip!
@RisingRedStorm We are very happy to hear you had such a great trip!
#TelAviv is said to be the city that never sleeps AND where it all happens! See why in this beautiful video! http://t.co/gJXP1UQ42F
Shabbat Shalom have a great weekend! #ELAL #Israel http://t.co/2tmcs2S6eZ
@MitchSchneider Thank you for telling us. We will work hard to improve!
@Kesher231 Thank you for flying with us!
RT if you have shared your New Year's resolution for a chance to WIN A ROUNDTRIP TICKET to #Israel! http://t.co/M0URZdXtbU #ELAL
@MitchSchneider Hope you had a great flight!
@bnbtlv Happy New Year!
Check out all of the exciting events happening this month in #Israel! http://t.co/knEAy5fmNk #ELAL
@barrettlane Have a wonderful trip :)
@ShariLGoldman Click this link: http://t.co/M0URZdXtbU
@MaxHendrix17 Have a great trip!
Planning a visit to #Israel? The Golan Heights is a MUST! Here are the top 10 things to see and do there: http://t.co/QbFInTIZpw #ELAL
Enter our New Years contest to WIN A ROUNDTRIP TICKET TO #ISRAEL! http://t.co/M0URZdXtbU #ELAL #newyearsresolution
@Heroism1 Hi! Please email us at socialmedia@elalusa.com and we will see what we can do!
@ReneeStraussBH Thank YOU for flying with us!
@jeremyElowe Glad you had a great flight!
@DannyWolfe1 Have a wonderful time!
#ThrowbackThursday! Can you recognize the aircraft type? #Nostalgia #ELAL http://t.co/hkLO1hsgIA
@ReneeStraussBH Please DM us your contact info and we will call you ASAP.
#ShabbatShalom, what are your weekend plans?
#ELAL is proud to launch a new wine menu on board! The selection process was made by International wine specialist @YairHaidu.
This year’s Israeli Opera Season features 100 performances from now until July '14! For more info: http://t.co/3jQmHvr3Rr #ELAL #Israel
RT @ReneeStraussBH: Ever flown @ELALUSA ? What fun! 14 hours of food, drink & movies. & red wine! Flight so smooth flight yet eveyone cheer…
@laurenpeikoff Thank you!
@jeremyElowe Have a wonderful flight!
@elza_news Awesome!
There's nothing like the view of mountains covered with snow from the window of your seat! #ELAL http://t.co/zFKJGeN0ri
Tel Aviv at sunset. Shabbat Shalom & have a wonderful weekend! http://t.co/LBfEjZ9rKb
Top 10 #sufganiyot, the round jelly doughnut eaten on #Hanukkah. Which one is your favorite? http://t.co/wQYdsTA3b0
LAST CHANCE! Enter to WIN 2 round-trip tickets to Israel: https://t.co/05QbftW6JY
Check out these beautiful Menorahs from around the World in honor of Hanukkah. Which are your favorite? https://t.co/6Rw02H19nP
Can you guess what time period these well preserved synagogue ruins in Bar’am National Park are from? #Israel http://t.co/tKN9Ph538X
#ELAL wishes you all a happy Hanukkah! Don't forget to enter our Hanukkah contest to win 2 RT flights to Israel! http://t.co/kL7JPcJdh7
@Andy_lml :)
@frankadvantage Sorry for the delayed response, did he take 2 bags?
Opera in the Galleries is a unique collaboration between the Israeli Opera and the #Israel Museum Check it out! http://t.co/JL2Ya8ukNB #ELAL
Winter Savings for Matmid members! $860 + 50 Matmid points roundtrip NY->Tel Aviv. Travel Feb 1-28, 2014. #ELAL http://t.co/JftdODcdTy
@_RandomTweeter_ Thank you! Hope to see you soon!
@U2DublinIreland Thank you :)
@TravelJasonsWay Thank you :)
@rebsteve Glad you will be back!
#ELAL head chef, Segev Moshe, continues to make special dishes for passengers as part of our 'Chef on Board' program! http://t.co/uasJUlCGUC
The 1st baby born at the IDF field hospital in the #Philippines was delivered on Fri. The mother named him #Israel! http://t.co/at8kn70tcw
Happy Birthday #ELAL!  Exactly 65 years ago today, EL AL #Israel Airlines was officially founded! http://t.co/sxBv7eL6dj
@avabraunfeld We are bummed too!
@laurenpeikoff We are so sorry for the inconvenience!
20% more EL AL points when you transfer #MembershipRewards pts from @americanexpress thru 11/30. Terms apply. http://t.co/yB1U9J4jnM #ELAL
Beautiful sky, at Ben Gurion Airport, TLV. Happy Monday! http://t.co/vOF597LyhE
Shabbat Shalom, we hope you have a great weekend! #GoodShabbos http://t.co/Dsx4UvL2As
Fun fact: The Negev desert takes up over half of Israel’s land area! http://t.co/CPcZiqLguY
#ELAL is keeping everyone in our thoughts during the current #LAX shooting.
For @Recommendmag's Readers' Choice Awards, #Israel was voted "Best-Selling Destination - Middle East" yet again! http://t.co/BbTUvYKIUs
@weizma Thank you! We hope you have a wonderful day as well.
@FreshTraveler Have an amazing trip!
Hot Winter Fares to #Israel! $999 nonstop roundtrip from NY, all tax & fuel charges included! Purchase by 11/15/13. http://t.co/jmAxRxdelv
Our 747 in an Ear, Nose & Throat Examination! #ELAL #Israel http://t.co/xYig63oQDq
The Lower Galilee is less than a 2 hour drive from Tel Aviv. Where is your peaceful getaway? #ELAL #Israel http://t.co/90PXsC3seV
@adinars Sorry for the delayed response, please send an email to socialmedia@elalusa.com!
@barcors Great to hear!
65 years ago, the Israeli flag became Israel's official flag. We're proud to have the Star on each aircraft! #ELAL http://t.co/yRCp9plhOR
#ELAL was honored to fly @SirTomJones1! He will be performing in Tel Aviv at @NokiaArena 10/26 & 10/28. Tix http://t.co/wnaGUXEhbC
.@YahooTravel picked Jerusalem as a daily travel destination recommendation. We couldn't agree more! #Israel #ELAL http://t.co/CB3P0JGKPl
Amazing hiking and attractions at Timna Park! Solomon’s Pillars are a set of naturally formed sandstone hills.#Israel http://t.co/y2b5Ixvfu3
Interested in diving? The coral reefs at #Israel’s southern Red Sea resort of Eilat are some of the best! http://t.co/QaYZDewKrd
Follow Travel Guru, TV/Radio Host and Author @RickSteves as he travels the Holy Land! http://t.co/kAtezXW1J4 http://t.co/G7aYqrpwgL
The first new 737-900ER aircraft was welcomed today by #ELAL employees, their families and special guests! http://t.co/3xzmdjLhUo
The "Jerusalem Opera” will perform Mozart’s Don Giovanni on 10/6 & 10/10, in the Tower of David Citadel courtyard. http://t.co/H1psCOIPpQ
Hot Winter Fare to Israel! $969 nonstop roundtrip from NY(JFK/Newark), tax & fuel charges included! Purchase by 10/14 http://t.co/WzthpY9gv7
#ELAL is excited to introduce 6 new Boeing 737-900ERs to its fleet. Check them out: http://t.co/SpdcA9vyEQ http://t.co/lvyr0kphkU
Congratulations to the 11 new pilots who joined #ELAL! http://t.co/xlumOPMcEp
#ELAL wishes you a happy Simchat Torah and Chag Sameach! http://t.co/qmkc7YiLCe
Exclusive savings from NY (JFK/Newark) for Matmid Frequent Flyers! $949+50pts for nonstop, tax&fuel charges included http://t.co/tr4RjE4Vuu
@ChaimOsina Hi Chaim, please send an email with your information to socialmedia@elalusa.com and someone will be in touch ASAP

urls.title: Five very good reasons to visit Israel! - The ESSENTIAL guide to Israel | iGoogledIsrael.com
urls.description: Five very good reasons why you should start packing your bags for that trip to the Holy Land...

data.text: In case you still need a good reason to visit #Israel, check out these five great reasons! http://t.co/ayraEblxTE via @igoogledisrael
#ELAL wishes you a happy #Sukkot! http://t.co/3gNAvJe5Db
@RealGur Hi Gurie, please send an email to socialmedia@elalusa.com with your information and we can definitely help you out. Thanks!
#TelAviv launched Free Wi-Fi as part of the strategic plan to position it as a hub of innovation & creativity! http://t.co/55epjO9g5k
RT @gett: @ELALUSA & @Gett uniting forces! Special benefit for #ELAL passengers: discount on rides in various destinations! http://t.co/LBW…
ELAL & @Gett uniting forces! Special benefit for #ELAL passengers: discount on rides in various destinations! http://t.co/TCeNTrwxCF
Don't miss this article about Marvin Goldman, who owns the world's largest collection of memorabilia from #ELAL!  http://t.co/LaDxOee1qs
Congratulations to Ellen G. of NY, winner of our Rosh Hashanah contest! We are so excited for her to experience #Israel! #MazelTov
It's now exactly that time of the day when everything turns gold, here at Ben Gurion Airport. (Photo: Yochai Mossi) http://t.co/cumGCYxGpE
#ELAL wishes you an easy fast and may you be inscribed in the Book of Life. http://t.co/365cdhxkCN
